Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at AC Embassy Hotel places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Workers Stadium and Lama Temple. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Yashow Market and National Agricultural Exhibition Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 89 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and plasma televisions. Rooms have private lanais. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon. This hotel also features wedding services, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Beijing? This hotel has 1000 square feet (400 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 1 PM
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 15 years old.

A stay at AC Embassy Hotel places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Workers Stadium and Lama Temple. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Yashow Market and National Agricultural Exhibition Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Workers Stadium - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Yashow Market - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
National Agricultural Exhibition Center - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Green T. House Art Gallery - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Tiandi Theater - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Poly Theater - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Nali Patio - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Dongsishitiao Bridge - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Dong Yue Miao - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Chaoyang Theater - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Lama Temple - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Lady Street - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Temple of Confucius - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Ritan Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
The Imperial College - 3 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for AC Embassy Hotel is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 19.9 km / 12.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 15 years old.
